amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill for parking facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill for parking facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 338 (Roll no. 706).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
